title: Little Happier: Winston Churchill and “Game of Thrones” Illustrate the Same Observation About Power
description:
Winston Churchill and Games of Thrones’s Lady Olenna illustrate the same point: when confronting a powerful and lawless foe, imagination matters.
Get in touch on Instagram: @GretchenRubin & @LizCraft
Links and notes related to this episode can be found in the latest post here: https://gretchenrubin.com/podcasts/
Get the podcast show notes by email every week here: http://gretchenrubin.com/#newsletter
